results.title: Designing woman
results.creator_credit: Vincente Minnelli, Dore Schary and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: An easy-going, unpolished sportswriter and a sophisticated clothing designer meet, fall in love and marry while both are visiting California. When they return to their homes in New York, they decide to live in her plush apartment, and their differences soon emerge. Cast includes Gregory Peck, Lauren Bacall, Dolores Gray, Sam levene. Music by Andre Previn, choreography by Jack Cole.

results.title: Bitter sweet
results.creator_credit: W S. Van Dyke, Victor Saville and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: On the eve of her wedding to a priggish Londoner, a Victorian girl and her dashing music teacher elope to Vienna, where he hopes to sell his music. Cast includes Jeanette MacDonald, Nelson Eddy, George Sanders. Original play, music and lyrics by Noel Coward.

results.title: Scooby Doo
results.creator_credit: Raja Gosnell, Charles Roven, Richard Suckle, Mosaic Media Group and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Two years after a clash of egos forced Mystery Inc. to close its doors, Scooby-Doo and his clever crime-solving cohorts Fred, Daphne, Shaggy and Velma are individually summoned to Spooky Island to investigate a series of paranormal incidents at the ultra-hip Spring Break hot spot. Cast includes Freddie Prinze Jr, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Linda Cardellini, Rowan Atkinson, Miguel A. Nunez Jr, Isla Fisher.

results.title: Nancy goes to Rio
results.creator_credit: Robert Z Leonard, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Talented actress and dancer Nancy Barklay is vying for a lead role in this Broadway musical set in Brazil. Unfortunately her mother is competing for the same part. The situation becomes intolerable when Nancy follows her mother to Rio in order to wrest the part off her; complications ensue when both women fall for the same man. A featherweight musical filmed in Technicolor, ‘Nancy Goes to Rio’ is mostly remembered for being Carmen Miranda’s second to last picture. The film is essentially a remake of ‘It’s A Date’, Universal, 1940. Songs include ‘Ca-Room Pa-Pa’, ‘Love Is Like This’, ‘Yipsee I-O’, ‘Time And Time Again’, ‘Nancy Goes To Rio’, ‘Shine On’, ‘Harvest Moon’, ‘Magic Is The Moonlight’, ‘Musetta’s Waltz’ and ‘Embraceable You’. Cast includes Ann Sothern, Jane Powell, Barry Sullivan, Carmen Miranda, Louis Calhern.

results.title: Dennis the menace
results.creator_credit: Nick Castle, John Hughes, Richard Vane and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Where Dennis goes, mayhem follows and somehow, most of it seems to land in the lap of his long-suffering next-door neighbour, Mr. Wilson. Cast includes Walter Matthau, Christopher Lloyd, Joan Plowright, Lea Thompson and Mason Gamble as Dennis. Based on Hank Ketcham’s cartoon, Dennis the Menace.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Nick Castle, John Hughes, Richard Vane and Warner Bros Pictures

results.title: Gallant Bess
results.creator_credit: Andrew Marton, Harry Rapf and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: A story of love and loyalty between a young man and his horse until the outbreak of WWII when Tex (Marshall Thompson) joins the Seabees and has to leave his beautiful mare Bess behind. Tragedy strikes when Bess dies giving birth but Tex, stationed on a small Pacific Island, finds new hope and friendship when he becomes acquainted with another horse, one that turns out to be a good-luck charm. Cast includes George Tobias, Clem Bevans, Donald Curtis.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet
results.creator_credit: George Cukor, Irving G. Thalberg and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: This lavish production of Shakespeare’s Romeo and Juliet features Leslie Howard and Norma Shearer as the star-crossed lovers. Cast also includes John Barrymore, Edna May Oliver, Basil Rathbone, C. Aubrey Smith, Andy Devine.

results.title: Balalaika
results.creator_credit: Reinhold Schunzel, Lawrence Weingarten and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: An elicit relationship evolves between a Russian prince and a lovely cafe singer, a relationship that is seemingly doomed for these star-crossed lovers at a time when Russia is facing political upheaval. A romantic musical drama featuring Nelson Eddy, Ilona Massey, Charlie Ruggles, Frank Morgan, Lionel Atwill, C. Aubrey Smith.

results.title: Hills of home
results.creator_credit: Fred M Wilcox, Robert Sisk and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Starring everybody’s favourite dog, Lassie, this entertaining and enjoyable family film centres around a remote Scottish village and its only doctor (played by Edmund Gwenn) who decides to adopt Lassie. However unbeknownst to the doctor, Lassie has an aversion to water and even though the good doctor patiently tries to work her through this fear, it is not until Lassie is put to the test of saving the doctor’s life that the fear is finally overcome. Cast also includes Janet Leigh and Tom Drake.

results.title: Gremlins
results.creator_credit: Joe Dante, Frank Marshall, Kathleen Kennedy, Michael Finnell, Steven Spielberg, Amblin Entertainment and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Billy Peltzer’s father buys him a new cuddly pet. But heed these three warnings: Don’t ever get him wet. Keep him away from bright light. And the most important thing, the one thing you must never forget: no matter how much he cries, no matter how much he begs…never, never feed him after midnight. Cast includes Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton, Polly Holliday, Frances Lee McCain.
